        createMenu in interface RightClickEdit.PlottableMenuCreator
        Parameters:
        menu - the Menu to add items to
        destination - the Plottable point identified
        thePoint - the screen location of the mouse click
        theCanvas - the canvas to update following changes
        thePanel - the properties page current available
        theParent - the immediate parent for this object
        theLayers - the set of layers (plus data) currently in use
